name: Hail of Bullets
description: Kernan fires a forward hail of bullets in a cone-shape that increases in size.

name: Essence Sap

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.

description: Throw energy at your target, slowing them.

name: Forceful Displacement

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

description: Displace your foe through the Mists, forcing them away from you.

name: Glyph of Unity
description: Glyph. Tether yourself to nearby allies. Whenever you're healed, heal the tethered allies as well.

name: Glyph of Equality
description: Glyph. Daze foes or break stun for allies.

name: Ghastly Rampage
description: A ring of horrible, ghostly energy spikes up through the ground. Damages foes for 50% of their health.

name: Distributed Magic
description: The Vale Guardian distributes its magic to a point that must be absorbed before it unleashes devastating damage.

name: Linked Ignition
description: Karde's turrets fire projectiles in a 360-degree arc, dealing damage upon contact.

name: Flame Blast
description: Karde charges up a massive fire attack, dealing heavy damage and unleashing a cone that causes burning.

name: Platform Quake
description: "Knuckles" slams the platform, knocking foes into the air before following up with a spin attack.

name: Distributed Magic
description: The Blue Guardian distributes its magic to a point that must be absorbed before it unleashes devastating damage.

name: Explosion
description: The heavy bomb explodes, dealing massive damage to foes and the platform.

name: Ectoplasm

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Ectoplasm covers the ground, damaging and crippling foes caught in it.

name: Bullet Storm
description: The Vale Guardian sends slow-moving projectiles at you that deal damage on hit.

name: Cosmic Ray
description: Celestial Avatar.  Call down energy onto the targeted area to heal allies.

traited_facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Glyph of Rejuvenation
description: Glyph. Greatly heal yourself and your pet, while healing nearby allies for a minor amount.

name: Heat
description: Blasts foes.

name: Unstable Magic Spike
description: The Green Guardian creates unstable spikes of magic, teleporting players caught in the impact.

name: Spirit Fury

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Celestial Avatar

description: Smashes the ground, dealing impact damage to foes in front and underneath.

description: The Seeker pulses magic damage every second, hitting all enemies in range.

name: Glyph of Unity

name: Astral Wisp
description: Send a wisp to attach to your target. While attached, it will circle the target, healing nearby allies.
